full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 POST SYMBOL: DEPARTMENT OF STATE Form Approved BIOGRAPHIC DATA FOR VISA PURPOSES Budget Bureau No. 47-R151.2 INSTRUCTIONS Complete this form for your entire family (yourself, spouse and unmarried children under 21 years of age). 1. NAME (Family name) (First name) (Middle names) B4 QUANT NGA OTHER NAMES, ALIASES ( If married woman, maiden name and surname of any previous spouses) NAME IN NATIVE LETTERS OR CHARACTERS IF DIFFERENT FROM ABOVE 2. PLACE OF BIRTH (City) (State or province) (Country) DATE OF BIRTH (Month) (Day) (Year) THANH HOA V.N. 12 - 31 - 1915 SEX PRESENT NATIONALITY PAST NATIONALITY Male Female VIETNAMESE - 3. NAME OF FATHER 4. MAIDEN NAME OF MOTHER - Bul QUANG HOAN LE THI NHON 5. FATHER'S BIRTHPLACE (City) (State or province) (Country) 6. MOTHER'S BIRTHPLACE (City) (State or province) (Country) THLIA THEN V.N. THLIA THIEH U.N. 7. NAME OF SPOUSE (Maiden or family name) (First name) (Middle names) TRAM THI DANG 8. SPOUSE'S BIRTHPLACE (City) (State or province) 9. SPOUSE'S BIRTHDATE (Month)(Day) 10. WILL SPOUSE IMMIGRATE WITH YOU? (Country) (Year) Yes No HAM DINH 1920 11. NAME OF SPOUSE'S FATHER 12. NAME OF SPOUSE'S MOTHER TRAN DUNG TE DHONG THI NGA 13. BIRTHPLACE OF SPOUSE'S FATHER (City) (State or province) 14. BIRTHPLACE OF SPOUSE'S MOTHER (City) (State or province) (Country) (Country) HANOI UM HANOI VM 15. LIST UNMARRIED CHILDREN UNDER 21 YEARS, NOT U.S CITIZENS WHO WILL ACCOMPANY YOU NAME OF CHILD PLACE OF BIRTH (City, state or province, country) BIRTHDATE FOIA (b)(6) 16. IF YOU OR YOUR SPOUSE ARE NOW, OR HAVE BEEN, IN THE UNITED STATES, STATE: WHERE WAS VISA OBTAINED WHEN WAS VISA GRANTED (Month, Year) APPLICANT - SPOUSE CHECK TYPE OF VISA USED FOR SUCH ENTRY: Immigrant Government or international organization official or employee Exchange Visitor Other nonimmigrant Specify 17. IF YOU OR YOUR SPOUSE PREVIOUSLY LIVED IN THE UNITED STATES, STATE: DATE ADMITTED DATE DEPARTED REASON FOR DISCONTINUING RESIDENCE FORM DSP-70 2-66 (Over) A@44
